issue.title: [CI] Use Ubuntu Xenial (16.04) VMs on Travis-CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4281](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4281). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We're currently using the Trusty VMs on Travis-CI. Besides the fact that Ubuntu Trusty is soon 5 years old, it forces us to use the old pre-C++ ABI migration conda-forge packages. We should migrate all or most jobs to Xenial.
